ui.authormap.data
Class UserConversationMap

java.lang.Object
  ui.authormap.data.UserConversationMap

public class UserConversationMap
extends Object

For the owning user of this class, this object creates a map to other users with conversation content. : key is the name of the other user (student) that his user had a conversation with. Value contains a MyDocument object that contains the conversation.

Author:
kevin nam
